issues.description:
In the function `withdrawLeftOver()` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to msg.sender.

There is a check on storage index 0. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `sendToWinner()`.
issues.title: Ether send

issues.description: The return value of an external call is not checked. Note that execution continue even if the called contract throws.
issues.title: Unchecked CALL return value

issues.description:
In the function `sendToWinner()` a non-zero amount of Ether is sent to an address taken from storage slot 0.
There is a check on storage index 0. This storage slot can be written to by calling the function `sendToWinner()`.

issues.title: Ether send

issues.description: A possible transaction order independence vulnerability exists in function sendToWinner(). The value or direction of the call statement is determined from a tainted storage location
issues.title: Transaction order dependence
